text: "Say It Ain't So" is a 1995 song by American rock band Weezer. It is the third and final single from their debut studio album Weezer (The Blue Album). It went to number 37 in the United Kingdom and number 43 in Scotland. It is frequently voted as the best songs by Weezer. ==Track listing== Standard CD, 10-inch, and cassette single # "Say It Ain't So" (remix) – 4:17 # "No One Else" (live and acoustic) – 3:15 # "Jamie" (live and acoustic) – 3:53 * All live acoustic tracks were recorded on 99X in Atlanta, Georgia. ==References== Category:1995 songs Category:Weezer songs Category:Deftones songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Indie rock songs
title: Say It Ain't So
